faqs.question: What specific documents are needed for the registration of a commercial property in Noida
faqs.answer: Key documents required include the Sale Deed the Agreement to Sell the Occupancy Certificate OC the Completion Certificate CC the Allotment Letter if applicable and the necessary no-objection certificates NOCs from the developer and local authority.
